name: The Life Aquatic (LudumDare 48)
description:
Explore the wide ocean teeming with life. Find all 10 unique specimens and return to the surface. Be careful not to run out of Oxygen. Use arrow or WASD keys to navigate.

See how fast you can complete the mission and post your time

Made in 48 Hours for LudumDare 48 Compo - Deeper and deeper
